snippet: By late summer, 1,700 conductors will be using the Apple devices to scan tickets electronically and do much more.
abstract: Amtrak passengers will be able to print tickets or load a special bar code on their smartphone screens for conductors to scan, and conductors will be able to keep track of passengers on board, all by using iPhones; system should be at least partly in place by the end of summer.
lead_paragraph: By late summer, 1,700 conductors will be using the Apple devices to scan tickets electronically and do much more.

headline.seo: Amtrak to Use iPhones to Streamline Service
headline.main: Amtrak Enlists iPhones as a Service Tool
headline.print_headline: Amtrak Enlists iPhones as a Service Tool
